common.admin_label: This will change the label of the module in the builder for easier identification.
common.cssClass: Input custom CSS classes here, separated by spaces. These classes can be used in your custom CSS to style the element.
common.cssId: Input a custom CSS ID here. This ID can be used for anchor links or custom CSS targeting.
common.padding: Padding is the space inside your element between the content and the border. You can set individual values for top, bottom, left, and right.
common.margin: Margin is the space outside your element. You can use this to create space between different modules on your page.
common.border: Border settings allow you to define the width, style, and color of the boundary around your element, as well as corner rounding (radius).
common.boxShadow: Box Shadow adds depth to your element by creating a shadow effect behind it. You can control the offset, blur, and spread of the shadow.
common.background: Background settings allow you to set colors, gradients, images, or even videos as the background for this element.
common.backgroundImage: Upload or select an image to use as the background for this element.
common.backgroundColor: Choose a color to use as the background for this element.
common.backgroundGradient: Create a linear or radial gradient background for this element.
common.backgroundGradientShowAboveImage: If enabled, the gradient will be placed above the background image.
common.backgroundImageSize: Determine how the background image should be scaled: 'Cover' to fill the area, 'Fit' to show the whole image, or 'Auto' for actual size.
common.backgroundImageWidth: Set a custom width for the background image (e.g. 50%, 300px).
common.backgroundImageHeight: Set a custom height for the background image (e.g. 50%, 300px).
common.backgroundImagePosition: Select the starting position of the background image within the element.
common.backgroundImageRepeat: Determine if the background image should repeat horizontally, vertically, both, or not at all.
common.backgroundImageAttachment: Choose whether the background image stays fixed in place or scrolls with the content.
common.backgroundImageBlendMode: Choose how the background image blends with the background color or other elements below it.
common.backgroundVideo: Upload or select a video file (MP4/WebM) to use as a background loop.
common.backgroundVideoMp4: Upload or select an MP4 video file for best compatibility.
common.backgroundVideoWebm: Upload or select a WebM video file for smaller file sizes and transparency support.
common.backgroundVideoWidth: Set the width of the background video (default is 100%).
common.backgroundVideoHeight: Set the height of the background video (default is auto).
common.pauseVideoOnPlay: When enabled, this video will pause if another video on the page starts playing.
common.pauseVideoNotInView: When enabled, this video will pause when it scrolls out of the browser's viewport to save system resources.
common.backgroundVideoLoop: If enabled, the background video will play continuously in a loop.
common.backgroundVideoMute: If enabled, the background video will be muted (no sound). Muted videos are often required for autoplay.
common.backgroundVideoOverlayColor: Apply a color overlay on top of the background video to improve text readability.
common.backgroundPattern: Select a pattern style to overlay on your background.
common.backgroundPatternColor: Set the primary color for the pattern elements.
common.backgroundPatternTransform: Flip, rotate, or invert the pattern to adjust its orientation.
common.backgroundPatternSize: Control the size scaling of the pattern (Actual, Cover, Fit, Stretch, or Custom).
common.backgroundPatternWidth: Set a custom width for the background pattern (e.g. 100px, 50%). Works when Pattern Size is set to Custom Size.
common.backgroundPatternHeight: Set a custom height for the background pattern (e.g. 100px, 50%). Works when Pattern Size is set to Custom Size.
common.backgroundPatternProportional: Link width and height to maintain the pattern's aspect ratio.
common.backgroundPatternRepeatOrigin: Determine the starting position (origin) of the pattern grid (e.g., Top Left, Center).
common.backgroundPatternHorizontalOffset: Shift the pattern horizontally from its origin point.
common.backgroundPatternVerticalOffset: Shift the pattern vertically from its origin point.
common.backgroundPatternRepeat: Determine how the pattern repeats across the background area.
common.backgroundPatternBlendMode: Choose how the pattern blends with the background color/image below it.
common.backgroundMask: Select a shape mask to apply to the background, creating unique frames or dividers.
common.backgroundMaskColor: Set the color of the mask shape.
common.backgroundMaskTransform: Flip, rotate, or invert the mask shape.
common.backgroundMaskSize: Control how the mask scales within the element (Stretch, Cover, Fit, etc.).
common.backgroundMaskWidth: Set a custom width for the background mask.
common.backgroundMaskHeight: Set a custom height for the background mask.
common.backgroundMaskPosition: Adjust the positioning of the mask shape.
common.backgroundMaskAspectRatio: Define the aspect ratio of the mask shape.
common.backgroundMaskBlendMode: Choose how the mask blends with the background colors or images to create unique compositions.
common.parallax: Enable a parallax effect for the background image, where the image moves slower than the rest of the content during scroll.
common.parallaxMethod: Choose the parallax method: 'True Parallax' uses absolute coordinates for a smoother effect, while 'CSS' uses background-attachment: fixed.
common.width: Define the width of the element. You can use percentages or fixed pixel values.
common.max_width: Setting a maximum width prevents the element from growing larger than a certain size, which is useful for maintaining readability on large screens.
common.maxWidth: Setting a maximum width prevents the element from growing larger than a certain size, which is useful for maintaining readability on large screens.
common.height: Set a specific height for the element. Leave empty for auto-height based on content.
common.min_height: A minimum height ensures that the element always occupies at least a certain amount of vertical space, even if it has no content.
common.opacity: Adjust the transparency of the element. 100% is fully opaque, and 0% is completely invisible.
common.blur: Apply a Gaussian blur effect to the element. Higher values make the element appear more out of focus.
common.brightness: Increase or decrease the brightness of the element. 100% is the original brightness.
common.contrast: Adjust the contrast of the element. 100% is the original contrast.
common.grayscale: Converts the colors of the element to shades of gray. 100% is fully grayscale.
common.sepia: Applies a sepia tone to the element, giving it an old, brownish photographic look.
common.saturate: Increase or decrease the color intensity of the element. 100% is original saturation.
common.hue_rotate: Apply a hue rotation to the element's colors, shifting all colors around the color wheel.
common.invert: Inverts the colors of the element, making it look like a photographic negative.
common.blend_mode: Determines how this element's colors blend with the colors of the elements behind it.
common.transform_scale: Scale the entire element up or down in size without affecting the layout of surrounding elements.
common.transform_translate_x: Move the element horizontally from its original position.
common.transform_translate_y: Move the element vertically from its original position.
common.transform_rotate: Rotate the element around the X-axis (creating a 3D flip effect).
common.transform_rotate_y: Rotate the element around the Y-axis (creating a 3D flip effect).
common.transform_rotate_z: Rotate the element in 2D space clockwise or counter-clockwise.
common.transform_skew_x: Skew the element horizontally, distorting its horizontal axis.
common.transform_skew_y: Skew the element vertically, distorting its vertical axis.
common.visibility_desktop: Toggle whether this element is visible on desktop devices.
common.visibility_tablet: Toggle whether this element is visible on tablet devices.
common.visibility_mobile: Toggle whether this element is visible on mobile devices.
common.overflow: Specifies what happens if the content of an element is larger than its container. 'Hidden' will clip the content, 'Scroll' will always show scrollbars.
common.position: Determines how the element is positioned on the page. 'Relative' stays in the flow, 'Absolute' is positioned relative to its parent, and 'Fixed' stays relative to the viewport.
common.z_index: Controls the stack order of elements. Elements with a higher Z-index appear 'closer' to the viewer and overlap lower ones.
common.transition_duration: The length of time a transition animation takes to complete in milliseconds.
common.transition_delay: The amount of time to wait before starting a transition animation.
common.transition_curve: Defines the speed profile of the transition, such as 'Ease' for smooth start/end or 'Linear' for constant speed.
common.link_url: The destination URL that this element should link to.
common.linkUrl: The destination URL that this element should link to.
common.link_target: Determines if the link should open in the same tab (_self) or a new tab (_blank).
common.linkTarget: Determines if the link should open in the same tab (_self) or a new tab (_blank).
common.loop: Enable this to repeat the content of this element multiple times based on dynamic data or specified counts.
common.order: Numerical order for displaying this element relative to its siblings. Lower numbers appear first.
common.animation_effect: Choose an animation effect that will play when the element comes into view.
common.animation_duration: The total time the animation takes to complete, measured in milliseconds.
common.animation_delay: How long to wait before starting the animation after the element comes into view.
common.animation_repeat: Determines how many times the animation should repeat. Choose 'Infinite' for continuous animation.
common.alignment: Align the content horizontally within the element: left, center, or right.
common.textColor: Set the color of the text within this element.
common.fontSize: Adjust the size of the text in this element.
common.fontWeight: Set the thickness of the text. Higher values result in bolder text.
common.lineHeight: Controls the vertical spacing between lines of text.
common.objectFit: Determines how an image or video should be resized to fit its container.
common.title: The main title or heading for this element.
common.subtitle: A secondary title or description below the main title.
common.content: The main text content for this element.
common.buttonText: The text displayed on the button.
common.buttonBackgroundColor: The background color of the button.
common.buttonTextColor: The text/label color of the button.
common.iconSize: Size of the icon in pixels.
common.iconPosition: Position of the icon relative to the content: top, left, right, or bottom.
common.iconBackgroundShape: Shape of the icon background: none, circle, square, or rounded.
common.titleFontSize: Font size for the title text.
common.contentFontSize: Font size for the content text.
common.mediaType: Choose the type of media to display: icon, image, or none.
common.aspectRatio: The width-to-height ratio of the element (e.g., 16:9, 4:3, 1:1).
common.gap: Spacing between items in a grid or list.
common.columns: Number of columns to display in the grid layout.
common.items: Collection of items to display in this element.
common.layout_type: Choose between Flexbox or Grid layout. Flexbox is best for 1D layouts (rows/cols), while Grid is for 2D.
common.direction: The direction in which items are placed in the flex container (e.g., Row for horizontal, Column for vertical).
common.justify_content: aligns items along the main axis (horizontal for Row, vertical for Column).
common.align_items: aligns items along the cross axis (vertical for Row, horizontal for Column).
common.flex_wrap: Determines whether items should wrap to multiple lines or stay on a single line.
common.align_content: Aligns the lines of a flex container when there is extra space in the cross-axis.
common.column_widths: Choose between equal-width, auto-sized, or manual definition columns.
common.column_count: Set the number of columns in the grid. Use 'auto' for automatic placement.
common.column_min_width: The minimum allowed width for each column before wrapping.
common.collapse_empty: Automatically hide columns that have no content.
common.auto_columns: Define the size of implicitly created columns.
common.row_heights: Control the height of rows: auto-sized or custom.
common.row_count: Define the explicit number of rows.
common.auto_rows: Define the size of implicitly created rows.
common.grid_direction: Controls how auto-placed items flow into the grid.
common.grid_density: Controls how the auto-placement algorithm works. 'Dense' attempts to fill holes earlier in the grid.
common.justify_items: Aligns items along the row axis (horizontally).
common.place_items: Shorthand for aligning items along both block and inline axes.

loop.loop_enable: Enable loop to iterate over a list of items based on your query settings.
loop.query_type: Choose the type of content to query for your loop: Post Types, Terms, or Users.
loop.post_type: Select one or more post types to display. Common types include Posts, Pages, and Products.
loop.taxonomy: Select the taxonomies you want to retrieve terms from, such as Categories or Tags.
loop.user_role: Filter users by their assigned roles.
loop.exclude_users: Select specific users to exclude from the results.
loop.meta_query: Add custom filters based on post metadata (custom fields). Matches Key/Value pairs.
loop.order_by: Choose the criteria for sorting the results.
loop.order: Choose whether to sort results in ascending or descending order.
loop.posts_per_page: The maximum number of items to display in this loop.
loop.offset: The number of items to skip at the beginning of the list.
loop.include_terms: Select categories or tags to include.
loop.exclude_terms: Select categories or tags to exclude.
loop.hide_empty: Hide terms that don't have any posts assigned to them.
loop.exclude_current: Exclude the current post from the loop results.
loop.ignore_sticky: Ignore sticky post settings and treat them as regular posts.

section.fullWidth: When enabled, the section will stretch to the full width of the browser window. If disabled, it will be contained within the global site width.

row.gutterWidth: Adjust the spacing between columns in this row. A value of 0 will make columns touch each other.
row.equalizeColumns: When enabled, all columns in this row will have the same height, even if their content lengths differ.
row.maxWidth: Set the maximum width for this row. Useful for limiting the row width on large screens.

column.verticalAlignment: Align the content of this column to the top, center, or bottom of the column's height.

text.content: The main text content of the module. You can use simple HTML or just plain text.

heading.content: The text for your title or heading.
heading.level: The HTML heading level (H1-H6). H1 is usually reserved for the main page title.

image.src: The source URL of the image you want to display.
image.alt: Alternative text for accessibility and SEO. Describes the image for screen readers and search engines.
image.title: Text that appears as a tooltip when the user hovers over the image.
image.caption: Optional caption text displayed below the image.
image.lightbox: When enabled, clicking the image will open it in an overlay with a zoomed view.
image.linkUrl: URL to navigate to when the image is clicked.
image.linkTarget: Determines if the link opens in the same or a new browser tab.
image.overlayEnabled: Show a color overlay when hovering over the image.
image.overlayColor: The color of the overlay that appears on hover.
image.objectFit: How the image should be resized to fit its container: cover, contain, fill, or none.

button.text: The text label that appears on the button.
button.url: The URL the button will link to when clicked.
button.target: Determines if the button link opens in the same or a new browser tab.
button.icon: Name of the icon to display alongside the button text (using Lucide icons).
button.iconPosition: Choose whether the icon appears to the left or right of the button text.
button.size: Controls the overall size of the button: small, medium, or large.
button.fullWidth: When enabled, the button will stretch to fill the full width of its container.
button.hoverBackgroundColor: The background color of the button when the user hovers over it.
button.hoverTextColor: The text color of the button when the user hovers over it.

icon.icon: Choose the icon to display from the Lucide icon library.
icon.iconColor: Set the color of the icon.
icon.iconSize: Adjust the size of the icon in pixels.
icon.iconBackgroundColor: Set a background color behind the icon.
icon.iconPadding: Add padding around the icon within its background.
icon.iconBorderRadius: Round the corners of the icon background.

divider.style: Choose the visual style of the divider line: solid, dashed, dotted, or double.
divider.weight: Set the thickness of the divider line.
divider.color: Choose the color of the divider line.
divider.width: Set the width of the divider as a percentage or fixed value.

spacer.height: Set the vertical space created by this spacer element.

video.videoType: Choose the video source type: YouTube, Vimeo, or self-hosted.
video.youtubeUrl: Enter the full YouTube video URL.
video.vimeoUrl: Enter the full Vimeo video URL.
video.selfHostedUrl: Upload or provide a URL to a self-hosted video file.
video.posterImage: Image displayed before the video plays. Acts as a video thumbnail/cover.
video.aspectRatio: The width-to-height ratio of the video player (e.g., 16:9, 4:3).
video.autoplay: When enabled, the video will start playing automatically when the page loads.
video.loop: When enabled, the video will restart automatically when it ends.
video.muted: When enabled, the video will play without sound. Required for autoplay in most browsers.
video.controls: When enabled, video playback controls will be visible to the user.

gallery.images: Add images to your gallery collection.
gallery.columns: Number of columns to display in the gallery grid.
gallery.lightbox: Enable lightbox to view images in an overlay when clicked.
gallery.aspectRatio: The aspect ratio for gallery images.
gallery.hoverEffect: Animation effect when hovering over gallery images.

audio.src: URL or file path to the audio file.
audio.autoplay: When enabled, the audio will start playing automatically.
audio.loop: When enabled, the audio will repeat continuously.
audio.controls: Show audio playback controls to the user.
audio.muted: Start the audio muted by default.

embed.code: Paste the embed code (iframe, script, etc.) from the third-party service.
embed.aspectRatio: Set the aspect ratio for the embedded content.

lottie.src: URL to the Lottie animation JSON file.
lottie.loop: When enabled, the animation will repeat continuously.
lottie.autoplay: When enabled, the animation starts automatically.
lottie.speed: Playback speed of the animation (1 = normal speed).
lottie.direction: Animation playback direction: forward or reverse.

beforeAfter.beforeImage: The 'before' image shown on the left/top side of the comparison.
beforeAfter.afterImage: The 'after' image shown on the right/bottom side of the comparison.
beforeAfter.startPosition: Initial position of the comparison slider (0-100%).

videoPopup.thumbnailImage: Image displayed as the video thumbnail before opening the popup.
videoPopup.videoUrl: URL of the video to play in the popup.
videoPopup.playIcon: Style of the play icon displayed over the thumbnail.

videoSlider.videos: Collection of videos to display in the slider.
videoSlider.autoplay: When enabled, automatically advance to the next video.
videoSlider.showControls: Display navigation controls on the slider.

accordion.items: Collection of accordion items with title and content.
accordion.allowMultiple: When enabled, multiple accordion items can be open simultaneously.
accordion.toggleIcon: Style of the expand/collapse icon: chevron, plus, arrow, or none.
accordion.iconPosition: Position of the toggle icon: left or right side of the header.
accordion.headerBackgroundColor: Background color of the accordion header.
accordion.headerTextColor: Text color of the accordion header.
accordion.headerFontSize: Font size for the accordion header text.
accordion.contentBackgroundColor: Background color of the accordion content area.
accordion.contentTextColor: Text color of the accordion content.
accordion.contentPadding: Padding inside the accordion content area.

tabs.items: Collection of tab items with title and content.
tabs.defaultTab: Index of the tab that should be active by default (starts at 0).
tabs.tabAlignment: Horizontal alignment of the tab buttons.
tabs.tabPosition: Position of the tab buttons: top, bottom, left, or right.
tabs.tabBackgroundColor: Background color of inactive tab buttons.
tabs.activeTabBackgroundColor: Background color of the active tab button.
tabs.activeTabTextColor: Text color of the active tab button.

toggle.title: The title/header of the toggle element.
toggle.content: Content revealed when the toggle is expanded.
toggle.openByDefault: When enabled, the toggle starts in the expanded state.

slider.autoplay: When enabled, the slider will automatically advance.
slider.autoplaySpeed: Time in milliseconds between slide transitions.
slider.showArrows: Display navigation arrows on the slider.
slider.showDots: Display pagination dots below the slider.
slider.fade: Use fade transition instead of slide.
slider.speed: Duration of the slide transition animation in milliseconds.

counter.startValue: The initial number to start counting from.
counter.endValue: The final number to count up to.
counter.duration: How long the counting animation should take in milliseconds.
counter.prefix: Text or symbol displayed before the number (e.g., '$', '€').
counter.suffix: Text or symbol displayed after the number (e.g., '+', '%', 'K').
counter.decimals: Number of decimal places to display.

circleCounter.strokeWidth: Thickness of the circle progress bar.
circleCounter.circleColor: Color of the unfilled portion of the circle.
circleCounter.progressColor: Color of the filled progress portion.
circleCounter.showPercentage: Display the percentage value in the center.

numberCounter.number: The number to display and animate to.
numberCounter.title: Title or label for the counter.

countdown.targetDate: The date and time to count down to.
countdown.expiredMessage: Message to display when the countdown reaches zero.
countdown.labels: Custom labels for days, hours, minutes, seconds.

progressBar.showPercentage: Display the percentage value as text.
progressBar.barColor: Color of the filled progress portion.
progressBar.animated: Enable animation when the progress bar comes into view.
progressBar.striped: Add striped pattern to the progress bar.

testimonial.quote: The testimonial text or customer quote.
testimonial.authorName: Name of the person giving the testimonial.
testimonial.authorTitle: Job title or company of the testimonial author.
testimonial.layout: Layout style: default, card, or minimalist.

pricingTable.title: Title or name of the pricing plan.
pricingTable.subtitle: Optional subtitle or plan description.
pricingTable.features: List of features included in this plan.
pricingTable.buttonUrl: URL the button should link to.
pricingTable.featured: Highlight this plan as featured or recommended.

alert.type: Alert style type: info, success, warning, or error.
alert.title: Optional title for the alert message.
alert.dismissible: Allow users to close/dismiss the alert.
alert.showIcon: Display an icon based on the alert type.

code.showLineNumbers: Display line numbers alongside the code.
code.theme: Color theme for the code display: dark or light.
code.copyButton: Show a button to copy the code to clipboard.

quote.author: Name of the person being quoted.
quote.source: Source or publication of the quote.
quote.style: Visual style of the quote block.

blurb.title: The heading or title for the blurb.
blurb.mediaType: Type of media to display: icon, image, or none.
blurb.icon: Icon to display (when media type is icon).
blurb.image: Image to display (when media type is image).
blurb.iconPosition: Position of the icon/image: top, left, or right.
blurb.iconSize: Size of the icon in pixels.
blurb.iconBackgroundShape: Shape of the icon background: none, circle, square, or rounded.

cta.title: The main headline for the call-to-action.
cta.buttonText: Text displayed on the CTA button.
cta.buttonUrl: URL the CTA button links to.
cta.secondaryButtonText: Text for an optional secondary button.

iconList.items: List of items with icon and text.

author.showLink: Show a link to the author's page.

breadcrumbs.separator: Character or icon used to separate breadcrumb items.
breadcrumbs.showHome: Include a home link at the beginning.

starRating.rating: The rating value to display (e.g., 4.5 out of 5).

faq.items: Collection of FAQ items with question and answer.
faq.allowMultiple: Allow multiple FAQ items to be open simultaneously.

logoGrid.columns: Number of columns in the logo grid.
logoGrid.grayscale: Display logos in grayscale by default.

shareButtons.networks: Social networks to display share buttons for.
shareButtons.showLabels: Display text labels on share buttons.
shareButtons.style: Button style: default, rounded, or minimal.

tableOfContents.title: Title for the table of contents.
tableOfContents.headingLevels: Which heading levels to include (H2, H3, etc.).
tableOfContents.sticky: Make the table of contents sticky when scrolling.

menu.menuId: ID of the menu to display.
menu.mobileBreakpoint: Screen width at which to switch to mobile menu.

sidebar.sidebarId: ID of the sidebar/widget area to display.
sidebar.sticky: Make the sidebar sticky when scrolling.

group.layout: Layout type for child elements: flex or grid.
group.justifyContent: How to align items along the main axis.
group.alignItems: How to align items along the cross axis.
group.wrap: Allow items to wrap to the next line.

groupCarousel.slidesPerView: Number of slides visible at once.

contactForm.title: Form title or heading.
contactForm.subtitle: Subtitle or description above the form.
contactForm.recipientEmail: Email address to receive form submissions.
contactForm.buttonBackgroundColor: Background color of the submit button.
contactForm.buttonTextColor: Text color of the submit button.

login.title: Login form title.
login.redirectUrl: URL to redirect to after successful login.

newsletter.title: Newsletter section title.
newsletter.placeholder: Placeholder text for the email input.

search.placeholder: Placeholder text for the search input.
search.resultsPage: URL of the search results page.

map.address: The address or location to display.
map.mapType: Map style: roadmap, satellite, hybrid, or terrain.
map.markers: Custom markers to display on the map.

socialLinks.style: Icon style: default, rounded, or square.

blog.postsPerPage: Number of posts to display per page.
blog.columns: Number of columns in the grid layout.
blog.orderBy: Sort posts by: date, title, or popularity.

portfolio.itemsPerPage: Number of portfolio items per page.
portfolio.columns: Number of columns in the grid.

filterablePortfolio.columns: Number of columns in the grid.

postSlider.postsCount: Number of posts to display in the slider.

postTitle.linkToPost: Make the title a link to the post.

postContent.showFullContent: Display full post content or excerpt.

featuredImage.linkToPost: Make the image a link to the post.

relatedPosts.postsCount: Number of related posts to display.
relatedPosts.basedOn: How to determine related posts: category, tags, or author.

fullwidthHeader.title: Main header title.
fullwidthHeader.subtitle: Subtitle or tagline.
fullwidthHeader.backgroundType: Background type: color, image, or video.
fullwidthHeader.minHeight: Minimum height of the header section.

fullwidthMenu.menuId: ID of the menu to display.
fullwidthMenu.sticky: Make the menu sticky when scrolling.
fullwidthMenu.transparentOnTop: Transparent background at the top of the page.

fullwidthMap.address: Location to display on the map.

accordion.openHeaderBackgroundColor: Set the background color for the header when the accordion item is expanded.
accordion.headerBackgroundColor: Set the background color for the header when the accordion item is collapsed.
accordion.openHeaderTextColor: Set the text color for the title when the accordion item is expanded.
accordion.iconColor: Set the color of the toggle icon.
accordion.iconSize: Adjust the size of the toggle icon in pixels.
accordion.itemGap: Define the vertical space between each accordion item.
accordion.headerPadding: Adjust the padding inside the header area of the accordion items.
accordion.contentPadding: Adjust the padding inside the content area of the accordion items.
accordion.contentBackgroundColor: Set the background color specifically for the content area.

accordion_item.openHeaderBackgroundColor: Override the parent background color for this specific item when expanded.
accordion_item.headerBackgroundColor: Override the parent background color for this specific item when collapsed.
accordion_item.openHeaderTextColor: Override the parent title color for this specific item when expanded.
accordion_item.iconColor: Override the parent icon color for this specific item.
